mapper.insert: insert into orderlist(order_no, order_date, user_id, order_recipient, order_addr, detail_addr, order_phone, total_price, delivery_fee, delivery_memo, order_status) values(order_no_seq.nextval, #{orderDate}, #{userId}, #{orderRecipient}, #{orderAddr}, #{detailAddr}, #{orderPhone}, #{totalPrice}, #{deliveryFee}, #{deliveryMemo}, #{orderStatus})
mapper.select: select o.order_date, o.order_no, p.pro_image, p.pro_code, p.pro_name, od.de_pro_cnt, od.de_pro_price, o.total_price, o.order_status, o.order_recipient, o.order_phone, o.order_addr, o.detail_addr, o.delivery_fee from orderlist o, product p, orderdetail od where o.order_no = od.order_no and od.pro_code = p.pro_code and user_id= #{userId} order by order_date desc
mapper.update: update orderlist set order_status = '주문취소' where order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: select count(order_no) count from orderlist where user_id = #{userId}
select DISTINCT o.order_no from orderlist o,cart c where c.user_id = o.user_id and c.user_id=#{userId}

select o.order_no orderNo, o.user_id userId, c.mypro_cnt myproCnt, c.pro_code proCode, c.pro_price myproPrice from orderlist o, cart c where c.user_id = o.user_id and o.user_id = #{userId} and o.order_no = #{orderNo}
